text: Thought Catalog is a website that started in 2010. It was created by Chris Lavergne, an American entrepreneur and expert in media. The Thought & Expression Company owns it. Every month, about 6.6 million different people visit the site.Newton, Matthew Thought Catalog And The New Age Of Confessional Media Forbes. June 7, 2015Weissman, Saya Thought Catalog Wants to Capture the Millennial Moment Digiday. June 8, 2015 ==References== Category:American websites
title: Thought Catalog
